nodes.text: Chef Schlump was a female Human Meatlump who lived on the planet of Corellia during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Following the Battle of Yavin, she served as the personal chef of the Meatlump King. Schlump worked in the kitchen of the Meatlump Hideout beneath Coronet City and Schlap worked as her assistant chef. Her specialty was obviously meatlumps, the favorite food of the King. Around 1 ABY, a spacer who had infiltrated the Meatlump Hideout requested food from Chef Schlump for the starving Meatlump map maker in order to obtain the locations of secret Meatlump camps on Corellia. Chef Schlump also tasked the spacer to squash rodents, worrmps and meetles, in the hideout and collect their juices to produce Meatlump wine.

Schlump was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Schlump was added to the game as part of the "Meatlumps Theme Park", introduced with "Chapter 10: The Search for the Meatlump King", released on June 19, 2008.
